content:
Another great show! "The Good Doctor" is a fantastic medical drama with a unique perspective.

As for your question, "The Good Doctor" has been renewed for a sixth season, and it's expected to premiere on October 3, 2022, on ABC. You've got some time to catch up on season 5 before the new season drops!

In the meantime, you can also explore other medical dramas on ABC, like "Grey's Anatomy" or "Station 19", or catch up on other shows on their streaming platform, Hulu.

Let me know if you need any more help or recommendations!
